title: STUDY PLAN
content: The D3 Road Transportation Management program is designed to produce reliable professionals in operational management, planning, and management of road transportation. The program integrates theoretical knowledge with practical experience through a curriculum aligned with industry needs. Students are equipped with skills in transportation data analysis, traffic management, transportation regulations, and the use of modern technology to enhance the efficiency of road transportation systems. Graduates are prepared to become strategic solutions to increasingly complex road transportation challenges, both regionally and nationally.
